resources.string: Contact For Any kind of Information

New Govt. Degree College, Rajshahi is an educational institution located in Rajshahi city was established in 1986. It offers undergraduate and postgraduate degrees under Bangladesh National University. It was initially up to higher secondary, then it was called Government Intermediate College. Later it was upgraded to Degree College and renamed as Rajshahi New Govt. Degree College. Prior to the establishment of the college, it was the building of the Board of Education. Currently, students are studying science, arts and business education here. The number of teachers is 69 and 9 regular employees and also 23 irregular employees. The total number of students studying various subjects is about six thousand.
